amendment.description: To require the use of objective criteria to determine which undocumented persons have sufficient community ties to be awarded a Z visa and remain in the United States lawfully.

action.text: Amendment SA 1492 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 1235. (consideration: CR S7303-7304; text: CR S7303-7304) To require the use of objective criteria to determine which undocumented persons have sufficient community ties to be awarded a Z visa and remain in the United States lawfully.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1492 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 1235.
